# Reorestation Services at Chilcotin Military Training Area

## Tender Details

- **Reference Number**: cb-9029-3205831
- **Solicitation Number**: 1000253082
- **Publication Date**: September 19, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date**: October 31, 2023, 2:00 PM PST
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: None
- **Expected Contract End Date**: None

## Description

Indigenous Services Canada (ISC) invites bids for the provision of reforestation services at the Chilcotin Military Training Area (CTA). The CTA spans approximately 41,000 hectares, with most land owned by the Department of National Defence (DND). The management of forest resources on this land is under the responsibility of ISC.

## Requirements

- **Project Duration**: Up to one (1) year contract with a possible extension
- **Scope of Work**: Planting 280,000 seedlings at designated microsites on cut blocks
- **Project Location**: Chilcotin Military Training Area in British Columbia, Canada
- **Number of Plantings**: Spring 2024 season

## Mandatory Site Visit

A site visit is mandatory for all bidders. Visit/pre-site visit: 1238 Stack Valley Rd, Riske Creek, BC, Canada V0L 1T0, on October 18, 2023, at 9:00 A.M. (PST). Bidders must communicate with the Contracting Authority no later than October 16, 2023. A sign-in sheet will be used to track attendance.

## Evaluation Criteria

- The lowest price will be the primary evaluation criterion.
- Bidders who do not attend the mandatory site visit or do not send a representative will be deemed non-responsive and excluded from the evaluation process.

## Trade Agreements

This procurement is a competitive tender open to all qualified bidders. Suppliers must be pre-qualified in accordance with specified trade agreements.
